name: Pasta With Herbed Ricotta, Tomatoes and Spinach
keywords: basil, italian parsley, pasta, penne, pine nuts, ricotta, scallion, spinach, tomatoes, main course, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 cups of fresh spinach, well rinsed and tough stems removed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the rinsed spinach leaves in a large pot of well-salted boiling water until limp, about 1 minute. Drain the spinach and cool completely under cold running water. Pat dry and chop.
Put the ricotta cheese in a large bowl and beat with a fork until smooth. Stir in the spinach, scallions, basil, tomatoes, parsley and olive oil. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Cook the penne until tender in well-salted boiling water. Drain, toss with the ricotta mixture, garnish with the pine nuts and serve immediately.
